data.comment: The match has started at Strandvallen.
Mjallby's David Lofquist breaks free at Strandvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Norrkoping's Alexander Fransson has been booked in Hallevik.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Mjallby have a goal kick.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Max Watson for Mjallby gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Norrkoping goal kick.
Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Goal kick for Norrkoping at Strandvallen.
In the minute 18, Sead Haksabanovic for Norrkoping drives towards goal at Strandvallen. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 20, In Hallevik, Jonathan Levi of Norrkoping is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Norrkoping drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Norrkoping's Christoffer Nyman is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 24, Mjallby pushes forward through Jacob Bergstrom, whose finish on goal is saved.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Norrkoping get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 28, Mjallby needs to be cautious. Norrkoping have an attacking throw-in.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, Mjallby advance rapidly upfield but Per Martin Melin blows for offside.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kadir Hodzic (Mjallby) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Mjallby push forward at Strandvallen and Kadir Hodzic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Norrkoping defence.
Throw-in for Norrkoping at Strandvallen.
In the minute 36, Per Martin Melin signals a Mjallby throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Moses Ogbu.
That's a fine assist from Joel Nilsson.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Norrkoping.
In Hallevik Norrkoping attack through Simon Thern. The finish is off target, however.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Norrkoping.
Norrkoping awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Norrkoping's Jonathan Levi breaks free at Strandvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Per Martin Melin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Strandvallen the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Strandvallen.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Mjallby have a dangerous throw-in.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Norrkoping.
Norrkoping are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
In the minute 50, Norrkoping drive upfield and Isak Bergmann Johanneson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
Throw-in for Norrkoping close to the penalty box.
Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Mjallby's Moses Ogbu misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Norrkoping territory.
In the minute 52, David Lofquist gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mjallby.
Free kick Mjallby.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Norrkoping just outside Mjallby's area.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Norrkoping in the half of Mjallby.
Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norrkoping's half?
In Hallevik Mjallby attack through David Lofquist. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Norrkoping at Strandvallen.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Norrkoping.
In the minute 60, Per Martin Melin awards the home team a throw-in.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 62, Simon Thern (Norrkoping) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Norrkoping to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
In the minute 64, Norrkoping are pushing forward but Simon Thern's finish is wide of the goal.
Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Norrkoping.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Norrkoping at Strandvallen.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
Jesper Lofgren (Mjallby) has received a yellow card from Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
Norrkoping's Isak Bergmann Johanneson gets in a shot on goal at Strandvallen. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 72, Marcus Lantz (Mjallby) is making a first substitution, with Adam Petersson replacing Jesper Gustavsson.
Mjallby make their second substitution with Martin Spelmann replacing David Lofquist.
The away team have replaced Alexander Fransson with Kevin Alvarez. This is the first substitution made today by Jens Gustafsson.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Norrkoping is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Norrkoping close to the penalty box.
Free kick Norrkoping.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
In the minute 79, Important block from the Mjallby defence as Kevin Alvarez fires in a strike for Norrkoping.
Per Martin Melin signals a Norrkoping throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Erik Parsson is replacing Joel Nilsson for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
In the minute 81, Norrkoping drive into the zone and Sead Haksabanovic is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Christoffer Nyman for Norrkoping gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In Hallevik Mjallby drive forward through Moses Ogbu. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Norrkoping push forward at Strandvallen and Christoffer Nyman gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Mjallby defence.
In the minute 83, Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Norrkoping.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Norrkoping are caught offside.
Jens Gustafsson is making the team's second substitution at Strandvallen with Ishaq Abdulrazak replacing Henrik Castegren.
In the minute 86, In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Norrkoping's Christoffer Nyman gets in a shot on goal at Strandvallen. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 87, Christoffer Nyman's header is off-target for Norrkoping.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Mjallby surge into the attack at Strandvallen but Erik Parssonâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 88, Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Norrkoping's Jonathan Levi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
Per Martin Melin will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Norrkoping at Strandvallen.
Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Norrkoping.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
That's full-time at Strandvallen. The final score is 2-0.
It's now 2-0 in Hallevik as Jacob Bergstrom scores for Mjallby.
